title: Covid-19 Vaccine Basics
content:
At the end of the process, our bodies have learned how to help protect against future infection with the virus that causes COVID-19. The benefit is that people get this protection from a vaccine, without ever having to risk the potentially serious consequences of getting sick with COVID-19. Any
side effects
from getting the vaccine are normal signs the body is building protection.
How mRNA COVID-19 Vaccines Work
